companies.name: Oklo
companies.notes: SMR developer building first commercial reactor. Mission-aligned. High ops scaling need.
companies.nextAction: Find warm intro path or prepare proactive outreach

challenges: NRC licensing (initial application denied Jan 2022, resubmitting)
HALEU fuel supply constraints (specialized high-assay low-enriched uranium)
Scaling from R&D to multi-site commercial deployment
Manufacturing scale-up for reactor components

companies.name: Nano Nuclear Energy
